Package be.sddevelopment.utils.validation

Package containing utility classes to write clean code for validation purposes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ErrorTemplate<T>
    Description of file/class
    Failure
    Value Object used to return issues found when evaluating Fallible assertions.
    Failure.FailureBuilder  
    Fallible<T>
    Monad-style Wrapper class to be used for condition based execution flows.

    Description of file/class

    Enumeration indicating the severity of a Failure.

Package be.sddevelopment.utils.validation Description

Package containing utility classes to write clean code for validation purposes.
